title: Sleepycat License
description: This open source license used for the Berkeley DB database is rather strict because it requires you to provide a way to obtain the source code for the software which utilizes Berkeley DB as well as the original source code of Berkeley DB, the only alternative is to pay the copyright holder for a commercial use license.
